entities.name: PLATFORM PROVIDER
entities.description: The entity providing the platform-based ecosystems that facilitate diverse solutions and accelerate growth through network effects among users and application developers

entities.name: FIRMS
entities.description: Organizations that provide competing platforms and pose significant competition to the platform provider

entities.name: OEM PARTNERS
entities.description: Original Equipment Manufacturer partners who create products that may compete with the platform provider's devices, potentially affecting their commitment to the platform

entities.name: APPLICATION DEVELOPERS
entities.description: Individuals or entities developing applications for the platform-based ecosystems, whose engagement is crucial for platform success

relationships.relationship_description: Firms provide competing platforms, posing significant competition to the platform provider
The platform provider's devices compete with products made by OEM partners, potentially affecting their commitment to the platform
Application developers create applications for the platform-based ecosystems, enhancing the platform's utility and attractiveness
